author: A_Brickset_user
title: little but very good
review:
a little set but contains many gears for this size of set. and the mechanism to turn the propeller is pretty intelligent. (it is not very intelligent indeed, but for a little set it is fabulous)

if you come across one, buy it...

author: sabpol
title: A lot in a little set
review:
For a Technic set with only 126 pieces, this has quite a lot of building potential.  The instructions show you how to build both a hydrofoil and a helicopter, each with room for the Bigfig to sit. The instructions also show how to outfit the unit with a motor (not included) to bring your vehicle to life.

There are gears of 4 different sizes and shapes, plus 2 wheels with smooth rubber tires and a steering wheel.  

The Bigfig/Technicfig is a bit awkward-looking.  These did not seem to catch on the way the minifigs have.  But for the technical aspects, this is a nice set to have if you don't have a lot of time to build but want to create something functional.
